thread.title: Oscars 2017 Academy Awards Nominations Predictions | Variety
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017 Academy Awards Nominations Predictions | Variety

author: Kristopher Tapley
title: Oscars 2017 Academy Awards Nominations Predictions | Variety
text:
August 24, 2015 | 12:25AM PT UPDATED: Feb. 21, 2017 
This page will be your hub throughout the Oscar season for predictions in all of the Academy’s various categories as we move through the twists and turns of the circuit. Click through on each to see a list of contenders per category with ranked assessments of the various races. 
Just remember: An Oscar season is fluid. Things do change. We’ll be here to track the shifting and sliding as it happens. “Arrival” (Shawn Levy, Dan Levine, Aaron Ryder and David Linde) “Fences” (Scott Rudin, Denzel Washington and Todd Black) “Hacksaw Ridge” (Bill Mechanic and David Permut) “Hell or High Water” (Carla Hacken and Julie Yorn) “Hidden Figures” (Donna Gigliotti, Peter Chernin, Jenno Topping, Pharrell Williams and Theodore Melfi) ** “La La Land” (Fred Berger, Jordan Horowitz and Marc Platt) “Lion” (Emile Sherman, Iain Canning and Angie Fielder) “Manchester by the Sea” (Matt Damon, Kimberly Steward, Chris Moore, Lauren Beck and Kevin J. Walsh) “Moonlight” (Adele Romanski, Dede Gardner and Jeremy Kleiner)
